metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3629 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Undertow. A potential security issue in flow control handling by the browser over http/2 may potentially cause overhead or a denial of service in the server. The highest threat from this vulnerability is availability. This flaw affects Undertow versions prior to 2.0.40.Final and prior to 2.2.11.Final.

criterions.comment: undertow package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
